name: ArmourOfGod
description:
Three day game jam on the theme 'Christian Computer Games'. This was built by Carmen and Margaret (14, 11) using Construct 2. The goal of the game is to find the entire Armour of God. The story is not as fleshed out as last years game, but good work overall. 

WSAD to move and jump.

http://codethegame.blogspot.com/2018/08/game-jam-2018-day-1.html
